title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4212.16 - Confidentiality
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4212.16 - Confidentiality

State Regulations

To the extent permitted by law, all information regarding the
financial condition, marketing plans, manufacturing processes, production
costs, customer lists and/or other trade secrets and proprietary information of
a person or entity requesting program assistance from the corporation, which is
submitted by such person or entity to the corporation in connection with an
application for program assistance, shall be confidential and exempt from
public disclosure. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
4212.16

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
